description: Not your average overshirt. This style is made from Incrediwool, an Italian recycled wool blend that lives up to its name. The beautiful bouclé texture of this style stands out, while the slim fit and clean looks make it a step (or 10) above the ordinary.
name: Prana IncrediWool Overshirt - Slim - Mens

specs.value: 35% Recycled Wool, 47% Recycled Polyester, 12% Recycled Nylon, 3% Other Fibers, 3% Elastane
